text.content: Hello! I'm Ewerton Solitto, 19 years old, and I am a Fullstack Developer with a primary focus on Front-end development. I've been studying programming for over a year and am actively seeking my first opportunity in the field.

I have a strong foundation in key web technologies and am currently dedicated to learning the most sought-after frameworks in the market, along with adopting best practices to ensure that my projects consistently meet high-quality standards.
